<p>Matematika Keuangan 2 Section 42 No 42.7<br />
Andhika N. (6 Feb 2025)</p>
<div class="problem">
<p><strong>Problem 1</strong>. <em>A 20 year bond matures for its par
value of 10,000. The coupon payable semi-annually is 400. Calculate the
price of the bond at a 6% yield rate convertible semi-annually.</em></p>
</div>
<div class="Solution">
<p><strong>Solution 1</strong>. <em>Diketahui:<br />
</em></p>
<ul>
<li><p><em>F = 10,000</em></p></li>
<li><p><em>Kupon Semi-annual (semesteran) sebesar 400 <span
class="math inline">ΓÇäΓƒ╣ΓÇä<em>F</em>ΓÇà├ùΓÇà<em>r</em>ΓÇä=ΓÇä400</span></em></p></li>
<li><p><em>yield rate convertible semi annually <span
class="math inline">ΓÇäΓƒ╣ΓÇä<em>i</em><sup>(2)</sup>ΓÇä=ΓÇä6%Γƒ╣</span> yield rate
efektif semesteran (dinotasikan i di jawaban ini): <span
class="math inline">$i = \frac{i^{(2)}}{2} = 3\% =
0.03$</span></em></p></li>
<li><p><em>20 tahun dengan kupon semesteran <span
class="math inline">ΓÇäΓƒ╣ΓÇä<em>n</em>ΓÇä=ΓÇä20ΓÇà├ùΓÇà2ΓÇä=ΓÇä40</span></em></p></li>
<li><p><em>C = F = 10,000 (tidak diberitahu, berarti asumsikan sama
dengan Face Value)</em></p></li>
</ul>
<p><em>Ditanya: Harga dari obligasi<br />
Jawab:<br />
<span class="math display">$$\begin{aligned}
    P &amp;= F \times r \times \ax{\angl{n}i} +  C \times v_{i}^{n}\\
    &amp;= (F \times r) \times \ax{\angl{40}3\%} + C \times
v_{3\%}^{40}\\
    &amp;= 400 \times \frac{1-v^{40}}{i} + 10,000 \times v_{3\%}^{40}\\
    &amp;= 400 \times \frac{1-(1.03)^{-40}}{0.03} + 10,000 \times
{(1.03)}^{-40}\\
    &amp;=12,311.4772 \approx 12,311.48
\end{aligned}$$</span></em></p>
</div>
